briefdescription.para: Constructor for QgsShortcutsManager.

parameterdescription.para: root QgsSettings path for storing settings, e.g., "/myplugin/shortcuts". Leave as the default value to store settings alongside built in QGIS shortcuts, but care must be taken to not register actions which conflict with the built in QGIS actions.

briefdescription.para: Returns an action by its name, or nullptr if nothing found.

parameterdescription.para: action name. Must match QAction's text.

briefdescription.para: Returns the action which is associated for a shortcut sequence, or nullptr if no action is associated.
Returns the default sequence for an action.

detaileddescription.para:
An empty return string indicates no default sequence.
action
action to return default key sequence for
objectDefaultKeySequence()

briefdescription.para: Returns the default sequence for a shortcut.

detaileddescription.para:
An empty return string indicates no default sequence.
shortcut
shortcut to return default key sequence for
objectDefaultKeySequence()

briefdescription.para: Returns a list of all actions in the manager.
Returns a list of both actions and shortcuts in the manager.
Returns a list of shortcuts in the manager.
Returns the default sequence for an object (either a QAction or QShortcut).

detaileddescription.para:
An empty return string indicates no shortcut.
object
QAction or QShortcut to return default key sequence for
defaultKeySequence()

briefdescription.para: Returns the object (QAction or QShortcut) matching the specified key sequence,.

simplesect.para: object with matching sequence, or nullptr if not found

briefdescription.para: Registers an action with the manager so the shortcut can be configured in GUI.

parameterdescription.para: action to register. The action must have a unique text string for identification.

simplesect.para: true if action was successfully registered

briefdescription.para: Automatically registers all QActions which are children of the passed object.

parameterdescription.para: parent object containing actions to register
set to true to recursively add child actions

briefdescription.para: Automatically registers all QActions and QShortcuts which are children of the passed object.

parameterdescription.para: parent object containing actions and shortcuts to register
set to true to recursively add child actions and shortcuts

briefdescription.para: Automatically registers all QShortcuts which are children of the passed object.

parameterdescription.para: parent object containing shortcuts to register
set to true to recursively add child shortcuts

briefdescription.para: Registers a QShortcut with the manager so the shortcut can be configured in GUI.

parameterdescription.para: QShortcut to register. The shortcut must have a unique QObject::objectName() for identification.

simplesect.para: true if shortcut was successfully registered

briefdescription.para: Modifies an action or shortcut's key sequence.

parameterdescription.para: name of action or shortcut to modify. Must match the action's QAction::text() or the shortcut's QObject::objectName()

briefdescription.para: Modifies an action's key sequence.
Modifies a shortcuts's key sequence.
Modifies an object's (either a QAction or a QShortcut) key sequence.
Returns the root settings path used to store shortcut customization.
Returns a shortcut by its name, or nullptr if nothing found.

parameterdescription.para: shortcut name. Must match QShortcut's QObject::objectName() property.

briefdescription.para: Returns the shortcut which is associated for a key sequence, or nullptr if no shortcut is associated.
Removes an action from the manager.

simplesect.para: true if action was previously registered in manager and has been removed, or false if action was not previously registered in manager

briefdescription.para: Removes a shortcut from the manager.

simplesect.para: true if shortcut was previously registered in manager and has been removed, or false if shortcut was not previously registered in manager

briefdescription.para: Updates the action to include the shortcut keys.

detaileddescription.para:
Shortcut keys are included between () at the end of the action tooltop.
action
The action to append the shortcut.
sequence
The shortcut sequence.

briefdescription.para: Shortcuts manager is a class that contains a list of QActions and QShortcuts that have been registered and their shortcuts can be changed.

detaileddescription.para:
QgsShortcutsManager is not usually directly created, but rather accessed through QgsGui::shortcutsManager().
QGIS 2.16
